comments.body: This module declaration syntax is good to use if you are declaring multiple modules in a single file. Using top level exports is better in this case since this declaration file is for just one module. [Here is a template that you can use.](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/declaration-files/templates/module-d-ts.html)
@PranavSenthilnathan even if is a scoped package? I tried with that template but autocomplete didn't work, this syntax is the only way it works, maybe am I doing something wrong?

@PranavSenthilnathan can you please confirm if I really need to use top-level imports, even though it's a scoped library `@mapbox/s3urls`?

Thanks!
